image.alt: Pristine white sand and turquoise waters of a Caribbean beach.
Expansive view of the deep gorges and ridges of the Grand Canyon.
A tranquil forest with a cascading waterfall amidst greenery.
Vibrant coral formations of the Great Barrier Reef underwater.
Dazzling display of the Northern Lights in a starry sky.
Historic ruins standing tall against the backdrop of the Grecian sky.
